attributes.action: A Call For Public Release Of The Panama Papers From Mossack Fonseca Law Firm
attributes.background: As recently exposed by the Media Companies, 11 million documents from the law firm Mossack Fonseca reveals elite tax havens & tax dodging. Unfortunately, these documents are in the hands of journalists who have their own agenda. We, the Public demand that these papers be put into the public domain

rejection.details:
If you would like an independent inquiry into the Panama papers, you might want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126661
